
```{r}
#| label: sec14-1
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

rsdatatmp <- rsdata %>%
  filter(shf_indexyear_cat == "2021-2023") %>%
  mutate(dapabiso = ATC_sos_lm_sglt2i == "A10BK01" & ATC_sos_lm_bbl == "C07AB07" & sos_lm_mra == "Yes")

tab <- rsdatatmp %>%
  count(dapabiso) %>%
  mutate(np = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, 1), ")")) %>%
  mutate(
    np = case_when(
      n == 0 ~ "-",
      n < 10 ~ "<10",
      TRUE ~ np
    )
  ) %>%
  filter(dapabiso)
```

The number (%) of patients 2021-2023 taking dapagliflozin, bisoprolol and a MRA concomitantly is `r tab %>% pull(np)`. 

```{r}
#| label: tab-sec14-2
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false
#| dependson: sec14-1
#| tbl-cap: "Secondary objective 14 - Dosage by ATC for patients taking dapagliflozin, bisoprolol and MRA 2021-2023"
#| tbl-pos: "H"

sec14func <- function(medvar) {
  tab <- rsdatatmp %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)))) %>%
    group_by(!!sym(paste0("ATC_sos_lm_", medvar))) %>%
    reframe(
      med = quantile(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.5)),
      q1 = quantile(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.25)),
      q3 = quantile(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.75)),
      mean = mean(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      sd = sd(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      min = min(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      max = max(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      n = n()
    ) %>%
    mutate(
      out = paste0(n, ", ", fn(med, 2), " [", fn(min, 2), ", ", fn(q1, 2), ", ", fn(q3, 2), ", ", fn(max, 2), "], ", fn(mean, 2), " (", fn(sd, 2), ")"),
      out = case_when(
        n == 0 ~ "-",
        n < 10 ~ "<10",
        TRUE ~ out
      ),
      var = medvar
    ) %>%
    rename(
      atcvar = !!sym(paste0("ATC_sos_lm_", medvar))
    ) %>%
    select(var, atcvar, out) %>%
    ungroup()
}

medvars <- c("bbl", "mra")

tab <- lapply(medvars,
  FUN = sec14func
)
tab <- bind_rows(tab)

tab <- tab %>%
  filter(!(var == "bbl" & atcvar %in% c("C07AG02", "C07AB02")))

tab <- tab %>%
  mutate(
    var = factor(case_when(
      var == "bbl" ~ 1,
      var == "mra" ~ 2,
    ), levels = 1:3, labels = c("Beta-blocker", "MRA", "SGLT2i"))
  )

colnames(tab) <- c("Medication", "ATC", "n, median [minimum, q1, q3, maximum], mean (standard deviation)")

# excel
if (output) {
  make_one_xlsxsheet(tab)
}

colnames(tab) <- sanitize_text(colnames(tab))

default_kable(tab,
  escape = FALSE,
  scale_down = T
)
```
